text: (Abatakkiriza bwe babeera mu maato ago) amayengo bwe gababikka ne genkana ng'ensozi (olwo nno) basaba Katonda, nga eddiini yonna bagikola ku lulwe yekka, naye bwabawonya, naabatuusa ku lubalama, mu bo mu baamu abeegendereza (ne baba wakati w'okukola e mirimu e mirungi n'emibi) era tawakanya bubonero bwaffe okugyako buli wa nkwe omukaafiiri
